name: Factory Hiro
description: Hiro Kikuchi (age 42) oversees an assembly line at the factory. Each day is a new puzzle that will test his reflexes, patience and quick thinking right as it all goes horribly wrong...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: SSE2 instruction set support Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 100 MB available space
